Questions?

UnitedHealthcare Customer Service representatives are available to assist you. Please call the number on the back of your plan member ID card during the listed hours of operation.

This is the amount you pay as your share of your prescription drug costs, such as deductibles (if applicable), co-pays/co-insurance and the amounts you pay in the coverage gap.

If you would like to provide feedback regarding your Medicare Advantage or Medicare prescription drug plan, you can call the number on the back of your member ID card (health insurance card) to contact Customer Service or you can provide feedback directly to Medicare through their Complaint Form. Please read the UnitedHealthcare Non-Discrimination Notice (PDF).
